channel.title: Max Combat!
channel.description: How Do I Change The Max Combat Level? On My Source Its 126 I Wanna Change It. How?

item.title: Max Combat!
item.dc:creator: @java_got_me_compiled java got me compiled
item.description:
@java_got_me_compiled wrote:

search for return 99;
you should see this

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 99;
change the 99’s to the Max stat not cb, its max stat, but you cant change max cb, only when u change stats ur cb changes and btw lvl 106 stats is lvl 135 cb

Read full topic
